title: Copy command in different place
diff_active: diff --git a/frontend/src/Navigation.js b/frontend/src/Navigation.js index fc335cd..d351bb4 100644 --- a/frontend/src/Navigation.js +++ b/frontend/src/Navigation.js @@ -4,4 +4,19 @@ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const LogoButton = () => ( - @@ -75,3 +90,7 @@ const MagicWandButton = ({ setPca, isWandActive }) => ( > - + @@ -93,4 +112,11 @@ const Navigation = ({ searchTerms, setSearchTerms, isLoading, setPca }) => ( - - 2} /> + + 2} + />

message_history.content:
I will add a CSS property to change the cursor to a pointer when hovering over the `LogoButton` component in `frontend/src/Navigation.js`.

Steps:
1. Add `cursor: 'pointer'` to the inline style of the `LogoButton`.

I will modify the `LogoButton` component in `frontend/src/Navigation.js` to refresh the page when clicked.

Steps:
1. Update the `onClick` handler of the `LogoButton` to use `window.location.reload()`.
I want the logo button to refresh the page on click.

message_prompt: Do the same thing to the magicWand button, when it's not disabled
message_edit:
I will add a CSS property to change the cursor to a pointer when hovering over the `MagicWandButton` component in `frontend/src/Navigation.js`, but only when the button is not disabled.

Steps:
1. Add a conditional inline style to change the cursor to 'pointer' only when `isWandActive` is true.
diff_edit:
diff --git a/frontend/src/Navigation.js b/frontend/src/Navigation.js
index d351bb4..54ed435 100644
--- a/frontend/src/Navigation.js
+++ b/frontend/src/Navigation.js
@@ -85,3 +85,4 @@ const MagicWandButton = ({ setPca, isWandActive }) => (
             width: '50px',
-            opacity: !isWandActive ? 0.5 : 1
+            opacity: !isWandActive ? 0.5 : 1,
+            cursor: isWandActive ? 'pointer' : 'default',
         }}
